scripts.setup: npm install --no-optional && npm run typings-install && npm run setup-demo
scripts.setup-demo: npm install --no-optional angular2@2.0.0-beta.12 es6-promise@3.1.2 es6-shim@0.35.0 reflect-metadata@0.1.2 rxjs@5.0.0-beta.2 zone.js@0.6.6
scripts.build_demo: tsc typings/browser.d.ts demo/main.ts demo/app_ui.ts demo/*.ts --module commonjs -t es5 --experimentalDecorators --emitDecoratorMetadata
scripts.demo: npm run build && npm run build_demo && electron ./demo
